Class ApplianceDao

java.lang.Object
DAO.DAO<Appliance>
DAO.ApplianceDao
public class ApplianceDao extends DAO<Appliance>
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing appliances in the database. Provides methods for querying, adding, updating, and deleting appliances.
Author:
24862664
